timeline.message:
Rename bad stuff and add javadocs

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: Humm, im not too sure about this name.
timeline.author: modmuss50

replies.bodyText: This is like a class that implements DynamicMBean, which the dynamic mbean supports retrieving information on server avg tick time and past tick times.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: You named the setter parameters the same as that, but those ones aren't javax.management.Attribute. Maybe attributeName would be better?
timeline.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText: these names are copied from jdk's names.
replies.author: liach
